name: Clubber Character Demo
description:
For Play in Browser: Play in fullscreen (Click the blue arrows)

A demo of a playable character with two power abilities. 

Use WASD or arrows to move.

Press E near two enemies to pair them up and make them fall in love. This will destroy them.

Press Q when your power meter is full to make all enemies fall in love with you within a set radius. This will destroy all the enemies.

Doors are indicated by green arrows which take you to different rooms.
